page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE IN READING
page.content: I get up at 6.30 and dress ready for school.I go down to breakfast.I have a bowl of cornflakes and a cup of tea, then I make lunch and wash.I use lux soap and macleans toothpaste.I make the beds.Mum does my hair,I go downstairs and put on my shoes,boater and blazer.Dad drives us to his work.We go down the M-way,round a roundabout,over a swingbridge.We see a lot of sheep and horses because there are two farms there.We drop my dad off.My mum now drives me to school.We start at 8.50.We have assembly,then start work.At 10.30 we go to play.I play chase.At 12.00 we have dinner and go back in at 1.00pm and weave and do our classwork.We go home at 3.o5pm. Dad comes home and we have dinner.I go to Brownies and get home at 7.00pm.I go to bed at 8.oopm. Nicola Reeves 9yrs English Martyrs.
